content: Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Overseas Quarantine Allowance due to COVID-19 pays $50 for every 24 hours on the Silver plan, $100 on the Gold plan, and $150 on the Platinium plan, up to total limits of $500, $1,000, and $1,500 respectively; it is not available on the Basic plan.
questions: What are the daily payment rates for the Overseas Quarantine Allowance under different plans?
How much can one receive in total from the Overseas Quarantine Allowance on the Silver plan?
Is the Overseas Quarantine Allowance available on the Basic plan?
What is the maximum amount payable under the Gold plan for the Overseas Quarantine Allowance?
How much does the Platinium plan pay per day for the Overseas Quarantine Allowance?
What are the total limit amounts for the Overseas Quarantine Allowance on the Platinium plan?
Can you receive the Overseas Quarantine Allowance for more than 15 days on the Silver plan?
What is the difference in daily allowance between the Silver and Gold plans for the Overseas Quarantine Allowance?
Are there any plans that do not offer the Overseas Quarantine Allowance?
What is the maximum duration one can receive the Overseas Quarantine Allowance on the Gold plan?
